title: Whitelist Gelato Team as Pool Creator
body:
Summary:
Approve the Gelato team to be able to create a Fuse pool for borrowing against G-UNI positions. Gelato will actively promote the pool as the preeminent borrowing option for G-UNI LPs.

This proposal will increase utility of G-UNI, drive TVL to Rari Fuse, and generate more fees for the Rari DAO.

Background:
The Gelato Network is a general automation framework powering a decentralized network of bots that executes smart contract functions on behalf of protocols and users. One of Gelato's flagship products, G-UNI, allows for users to provide liquidity to Uniswap v3 in a manner where positions are fungible and easy to manage. 

Proposal:
We propose the Gelato Network to be whitelisted as pool creators in order to create a new Fuse pool with G-UNI LP tokens as collateral assets. The pool will be upgradable and initial collateral assets will include G-UNI DAI/USDC, G-UNI USDC/USDT, G-UNI DAI/USDT, USDC, USDT, DAI. 

More Information:
https://forums.rari.capital/d/149-create-new-fuse-pool-for-g-uni-tokens

Vote Details:
FOR: Whitelist Gelato Team (Multisig: 0xed5cf41b0fd6a3c564c17ee34d9d26eafc30619b) as pool creator on the Rari Fuse platform.

Against: Do nothing.
author: 0x6c226b553ba4116fCec9d2ef1c1772ad2704Da50
